sdmxApis.description: Version 1.5.0 of the SDMX REST API specification (released: 09/2020) - see the [release notes](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/releases/tag/v1.5.0) and the [official documentation](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/tree/v1.5.0/v2_1/ws/rest/docs).

Version 2.0.0 of the SDMX REST API specification (released: 10/2021 with SDMX 3.0) - see the [release notes](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/releases/tag/v2.0.0) and the [official documentation](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/tree/v2.0.0/doc).

Version 1.5.0 of the SDMX REST API specification (released: 06/2019) - see the [release notes](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/releases/tag/v1.4.0) and the [official documentation](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/tree/v1.4.0/v2_1/ws/rest/docs).

Version 2.1.0 of the SDMX REST API specification (released: 01/2024) - see the [release notes](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/releases/tag/v2.1.0) and the [official documentation](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/tree/v2.1.0/doc).

Version 2.2.0 of the SDMX REST API specification (released: 02/2025) - see the [release notes](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/releases/tag/v2.2.0) and the [official documentation](https://github.com/sdmx-twg/sdmx-rest/tree/v2.2.0/doc).
